Detailed Description

Provides hit readout for simulated ECal detector.

Note:
This class uses the EcalHexReadout to transform the G4CalorimeterHit hits collection into a collection of SimCalorimeterHit objects assigned to hexagonal cells by their ID and positions. Energy depositions in the same cells are combined together into single hits.
It can be run in three modes:
  • Compressed hit contributions combined by matching SimParticle and PDG code (default mode)
  • Full hit contributions with one record per step (when compressHitContribs_ is false)
  • No hit contribution information where energy is combined but vectors are not filled (when enableHitContribs_ is false)

void ldmx::EcalHitIO::writeHitsCollection ( G4CalorimeterHitsCollection *  hc,
TClonesArray *  outputColl 
)

Write out a Geant4 hits collection to the provided ROOT array.

Parameters:
hc The input hits collection.
outputColl The output collection in ROOT.

Assign XY position to the hit using the ECal hex readout. Z position is set from the original hit, which should be the middle of the sensor.
